column3:
Is it sanctum you seek, my wayward children?
Or perhaps you are come in search of power.

That which lies at your feet─that blessed bauble─can grant you both.
You need but will it so.

Now take up your salvation and begone.
Mortal agency in matters divine shall not be suffered.

I am your mother. I am your maker! I. Am. Ivalice!
Consign me unto darkness and your light will be forever lost!
Prove me wrong, mortals! Make me submit─or die for your insolence!
